Body:
auth = FxABearerTokenAuth(email='test@restmail.com', password=
    'this is not a password', client_id='53210789456', account_server_url=
    'https://accounts.com/auth/v1', oauth_server_url=
    'https://oauth.com/oauth/v1', cache=False)
assert not auth.cache
r = auth(Request())
self.assertIn('Authorization', r.headers)
mock.patch('fxa.core.Client', return_value=mocked_core_client())mock.patch('fxa.oauth.Client', return_value=mocked_oauth_client())
